package.name: kernel
package.postinst: if [ -d /etc/profile.d ] then ln -sf __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/setup.sh /etc/profile.d/mdsplus.sh ln -sf __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/setup.csh /etc/profile.d/mdsplus.csh fi if [ -d /etc/xdg/menus/applications-merged ] then ln -sf __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/desktop/mdsplus.menu /etc/xdg/menus/applications-merged/ fi if [ -d /usr/share/desktop-directories ] then ln -sf __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/desktop/mdsplus.directory /usr/share/desktop-directories/ fi if [ -d /usr/share/applications ] then mkdir /usr/share/applications/mdsplus ln -sf __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/desktop/kernel /usr/share/applications/mdsplus/ fi
package.prerm: if [ "$1" == "0" ] then rm -f /etc/profile.d/mdsplus.sh 2>/dev/null rm -f /etc/profile.d/mdsplus.csh 2>/dev/null rm -f /etc/.mdsplus_dir 2>/dev/null rm -f /etc/xdg/menus/applications-merged/mdsplus.menu rm -f /usr/share/desktop-directories/mdsplus.directory rm -Rf /usr/share/applications/mdsplus if [ -r /etc/xinetd.d/mdsip ] then rm -f /etc/xinetd.d/mdsip /sbin/service xinetd reload fi if ( grep '^mdsip[[:space::]]' /etc/services >/dev/null 2>&1 ) then tmpfile=$(mktemp) if ( grep -v '^mdsip[[:space::]]' /etc/services > $tmpfile ) then mv /etc/services /etc/services.rpmsave mv $tmpfile /etc/services fi fi fi
package.triggerin: if [ ! -r /etx/xinetd.d/mdsip ] then cp __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/rpm/mdsipd.xinetd /etc/xinetd.d/mdsip if ( ! grep '^mdsip[[:space:]]' /etc/services >/dev/null 2>&1) then echo 'mdsip 8000/tcp # MDSplus mdsip service' >> /etc/services fi fi /sbin/service xinetd reload

package.name: kernel_bin
package.postinst: if [ -d /etc/ld.so.conf.d ] then rm -f /etc/ld.so.conf.d/mdsplus.conf 2>/dev/null touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/mdsplus.conf for l in lib lib32 lib64 do if [ ! -h __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/$l -a -d __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/$l ] then echo "__INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/$l" >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/mdsplus.conf fi done ldconfig > /dev/null 2>&1 fi if [ -d __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/bin64 ] then bits=64 else bits=32 fi if [ -d __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/bin${bits} ] then if [ ! -h __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/bin ] then ln -sf bin${bits} __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/bin fi fi if [ -d __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/lib${bits} ] then if [ ! -h __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/lib ] then ln -sf lib${bits} __INSTALL_PREFIX__/mdsplus/lib fi fi

rpm.install_script: #!/bin/sh set -e rm -Rf %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s export BUILDROOT="%(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT" export RPM_DIR="%(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/RPMS" mkdir -p %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/{BUILDROOT,RPMS,BUILD} pwd cd .. ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --enable-nodebug \ --enable-mdsip_connections \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc64 \ --host=x86-64-linux make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib64 mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin64 make clean >/dev/null ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --enable-nodebug \ --enable-mdsip_connections \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc32 \ --host=i686-linux make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib32 mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin32 make clean >/dev/null mkdir -p %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/yum.repos.d mkdir -p %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/ cp deploy/RPM-GPG-KEY-MDSplus %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/ outfile=%(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/yum.repos.d/mdsplus%(rflavor)s.repo echo [MDSplus%(rflavor)s] > $outfile cat - >> $outfile <<EOF name=MDSplus%(rflavor)s baseurl=http://www.mdsplus.org/dist/%(dist)s/%(flavor)s/RPMS enabled=1 EOF cat - >>$outfile <<EOF gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-MDSplus metadata_expire=300 EOF
rpm.spec_start: %%define debug_package %%{nil} %%global _missing_build_ids_terminate_build 0 %%global _unpackaged_files_terminate_build 0 Name: mdsplus%(rflavor)s%(packagename)s Version: %(major)d.%(minor)d Release: %(release)s.%(dist)s License: BSD Open Source - Copyright (c) 2010, Massachusetts Institute of Technology All rights reserved. Source: http://www.mdsplus.org/dist/SOURCES/mdsplus%(rflavor)s-%(major)d.%(minor)d-%(release)s.tgz URL: http://www.mdsplus.org Vendor: Massachusetts Institute of Technology Packager: Plasma Science and Fusion Center <mdsplus@www.mdsplus.org> Summary: %(summary)s Group: Applications/Archiving Prefix: /usr/local AutoReqProv: yes

ubuntu.install_script: #!/bin/bash set -e if [ ! -r ~/.gnupg ] then rsync -a alchome:/mnt/scratch/mdsplus/rpm-signing-keys.tgz ~ tar zxfC ~/rpm-signing-keys.tgz ~/ fi rm -Rf %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s export BUILDROOT="%(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT" mkdir -p %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/{BUILDROOT,REPO,DEBS} mkdir -p %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/REPO/{conf,pool,dists,db} cat - <<EOF > %(workspace)s/%(flavor)s/REPO/conf/distributions Origin: MDSplus Development Team Label: MDSplus Codename: MDSplus Version: %(major)d.%(minor)d.%(release)d Architectures: i386 amd64 noarch source Components: alpha beta stable Description: MDSplus packages SignWith: MDSplus EOF if [ "$(uname -p)" == "x86_64" ] then bits=64 else bit2=32 fi cd .. ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --enable-nodebug \ --enable-mdsip_connections \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc${bits} make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install make clean >/dev/null
